Category:Star Wars: Rogue Squadron III: Rebel Strike voice actors

nodes.text: Richard McGonagle {born October 22, 1946) is an American voice actor who provided the voices of General Grievous, Kit Fisto, Orvos, and Harvos in Season Three of the Star Wars: Clone Wars cartoon. He also provided the voice of a Rebel soldier for the computer game Star Wars: Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader.
He also had a bit part in the Lucasfilm cult/camp film, Howard the Duck.
